item.title: 能源援助结束，西班牙通胀率连续第三个月加速上升
item.description: 西班牙通胀率连续第三个月加速上升，原因是政府为遏制能源危机而收回的支持继续推高物价。【原文：Spanish inflation quickened for a third month as the rollback of government support to contain energy crisis continued to push prices higher.】

item.title: 瑞士服务业和消费者意外保持增长步伐
item.description: 年初，瑞士经济出人意料地保持了服务业和私人消费的增长势头，但对出口商陷入困境的担忧依然存在。【原文：Switzerland’s economy unexpectedly maintained momentum at the start of the year on services and private consumption, while concerns about struggling exporters persist.】

item.title: 巴克莱发现 IPO 干涸期即将结束的迹象
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）有迹象表明，长达数年的首次公开募股（IPO）荒正在慢慢结束，因为企业负责人和投资者都对中央银行的降息计划有了更清晰的认识。【原文：Barclays Plc is seeing signs that the yearslong drought in IPOs is slowly coming to an end as corporate chiefs and investors alike have gotten more clarity on central banks’ plans to lower interest rates.】

item.title: 苏纳克称保守党大选获胜将导致英国降息
item.description: 里希-苏纳克声称，在英国大选中投票支持其执政的保守党就是投票支持降息，这将英国央行卷入了一场它一直试图避免的运动。【原文：Rishi Sunak has claimed that a vote for his governing Conservative Party at the UK general election is a vote for interest rate cuts, drawing the Bank of England into a campaign it has been trying to avoid.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚大学伊藤称日本央行可能在 2024 年再加息两次
item.description: 哥伦比亚大学教授伊藤隆敏（Takatoshi Ito）认为，日本央行今年可能会再加息两次，但应避免直接应对日元疲软。【原文：The Bank of Japan may raise interest rates two more times this year, but it should refrain from responding directly to the weak yen, according to Takatoshi Ito, a professor at Columbia University.】

item.title: 运动鞋制造商金鹅计划在米兰上市
item.description: 金鹅（Golden Goose）将在米兰首次公开发行 1 亿欧元（1.08 亿美元）的股票，这家意大利奢侈运动鞋品牌旨在加强其资本结构并减少债务。【原文：Golden Goose is launching a primary offering of €100 million ($108 million) in an initial public offering in Milan as the Italian luxury sneaker brand aims to strengthen its capital structure and reduce debt.】

item.title: 迪拜不再只是中转枢纽，寻求更多回头客
item.description: 迪拜希望增加航空运力，并将重点从作为中转枢纽和短期目的地转移到方便往返旅行的新签证上，以吸引更多游客。【原文：Dubai is looking to add more airline capacity and is betting on a new visa that facilitates return trips to attract more visitors, as it shifts its focus from serving as a transfer hub and short-term destination.】

item.title: 前欧洲央行副行长称瑞士 "大而不能倒 "计划存在缺陷
item.description: 一位全球金融规则的主要制定者表示，瑞士对瑞银集团这样的全球系统性银行进行清盘的方法具有一些特点，可能会在未来假想的危机中加剧动荡。【原文：Switzerland’s approach to winding down a globally-systemic bank such as UBS Group AG has features which could worsen the turmoil in a hypothetical future crisis, according to a key architect of global financial rules.】

item.title: 研究警告：美国银行存在商业地产盲点风险
item.description: 一项新的研究显示，由于向房地产投资信托基金提供信贷额度和定期贷款，美国大型银行对商业地产的风险敞口可能超过监管机构的预期。【原文：Large US banks may be more exposed to commercial property than regulators appreciate because of credit lines and term loans they provide to real estate investment trusts, according to a new study.】

item.title: 香格里拉酒店集团将首次出售 10 亿元熊猫债券
item.description: 豪华酒店运营商香格里拉亚洲有限公司（Shangri-La Asia Ltd.）首次涉足中国在岸债券市场，因为利率分化使得人民币借款比以其他主要货币计价的债务便宜得多。【原文：Luxury hotel operator Shangri-La Asia Ltd. is tapping the onshore Chinese bond market for the first time, as diverging interest rates have made yuan borrowings significantly cheaper than debt denominated in other major currencies.】

item.title: 竞购盎格鲁集团失败后，股东称赞必和必拓的纪律性
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group）老板迈克-亨利（Mike Henry）周三放弃了收购规模较小的竞争对手英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）的大胆出价，这让急于证明该矿商不会不惜一切代价追求交易的投资者们欢欣鼓舞。【原文：Unable to press his target to the negotiating table, BHP Group boss Mike Henry on Wednesday walked away from a bold bid to buy smaller rival Anglo American Plc, cheering investors eager to see proof the miner will not pursue deals at any cost.】

item.title: 国际米兰曾是亿万富翁的玩物，后来钱花光了
item.description:
意大利最伟大的足球队之一刚刚赢得了第 20 个联赛冠军，但在董事会中却鲜有欢呼声。【原文：

item.title: 南非将在大选喧嚣中坚持利率不变
item.description: 南非央行将维持利率不变，在该国 30 年来最紧张大选后的第二天，在政治不确定性的背景下继续与通货膨胀作斗争。【原文：South Africa’s central bank is set to leave interest rates unchanged, staying the course in the inflation fight amid political uncertainty one day after the country’s tightest election in 30 years.】

item.title: 普锐斯召回，中国市场下滑，丰田产销量下降
item.description: 丰田汽车公司的销售和生产增长在 4 月份出现逆转，此前普锐斯（Prius）暂时停止交付，日本和中国市场的低迷抵消了欧洲和北美市场两位数的增长。【原文：Toyota Motor Corp.’s sales and production growth went into reverse in April, after a temporary suspension of Prius deliveries and a lull in Japan and China negated double-digit growth in Europe and North America.】

item.description:

item.title: 中国就恒大审计工作对普华永道开出创纪录罚单
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，中国准备对普华永道会计师事务所（PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP）处以创纪录的罚款，并暂停这家全球审计机构在中国最大的涉嫌财务欺诈案中的部分业务。【原文：China is poised to impose a record fine on PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP and suspend some of the global auditor’s local operations over its role in one of the nation’s biggest alleged financial fraud cases, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国各地区敦促企业限制购买外币
item.description: 中国的一些地区当局正在指导企业放慢购买外汇的速度，这表明在人民币疲软的情况下，中国正在采取进一步措施阻止资本外流。【原文：Some of China’s regional authorities are guiding firms to slow purchases of foreign currencies in a sign the nation is taking further measures to discourage capital outflows amid yuan weakness.】

item.title: 亚洲最大房地产投资信托基金呼吁香港恢复深圳多次往返签证
item.description: 亚洲最大的商业房地产投资信托公司称，香港当局应恢复向深圳游客发放多次入境许可，以刺激零售消费。【原文：Asia’s largest commercial real estate investment trust said Hong Kong authorities should resume issuing multi-entry permits for Shenzhen visitors to boost retail spending.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德收购 Neoen 大部分股份的交易即将达成
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，布鲁克菲尔德（Brookfield）公司即将收购 Neoen SA 公司 53% 的股份，这笔交易对这家法国可再生能源开发商的估值约为 61 亿欧元（66 亿美元）。【原文：Brookfield is nearing the purchase of a 53% stake in Neoen SA in a deal valuing the French renewable energy developer at about €6.1 billion ($6.6 billion), people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 两位基金经理押宝英国，击败 95% 的对手
item.description: 去年，逆向价值基金的两位经理人通过大举买入过时的英国股票，跑赢了 95% 的同行。2024 年，他们加强了这一押注，同时对美国股票避而远之。【原文：Last year, the two managers of a contrarian value fund outperformed 95% of peers by loading up on out-of-fashion UK stocks. In 2024, they’re strengthening this bet while steering mostly clear of US equities.】

item.title: 中国产能限制助力铝业反弹，铝价创两年新高
item.description: 中国作为最大的铝生产国，为实现减排目标，加强了对一系列金属的产能控制，铝的涨幅扩大到两年来的最高点。【原文：Aluminum extended gains to a two-year high after China, the biggest producer, tightened capacity controls across an array of metals to meet emission-cutting goals.】

item.title: 高盛认为印度的股票、债券和卢比是新兴市场的最佳选择
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：India’s stocks, bonds and currency are among the most attractive plays across emerging markets, thanks to a vibrant economy and policies that shield the country from global markets, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 国内需求疲软，中国转向出口牲畜饲料
item.description: 由于生猪数量减少和猪肉需求疲软，迫使加工商出口过剩的动物饲料，中国正向国外输送创纪录数量的豆粕。【原文：China is sending record quantities of soybean meal abroad, as a shrinking number of pigs and weak demand for pork force processors to export their surplus animal feed.】

item.title: 货币跌至低点，越南发出支持越南盾的信号
item.description: 在越南盾因美元走强而跌至历史新低之后，越南国家银行发出了捍卫越南盾的信号。【原文：The State Bank of Vietnam signaled that it’s ready to defend the dong after the currency slipped to a record low amid bouts of dollar strength.】

item.title: 签证规定放宽后东南亚赴华旅游人数激增
item.description: 据预订平台Klook Travel Technology Ltd.称，受新的免签证入境计划和更容易使用大陆无现金支付系统的吸引，中国正重新成为东南亚游客的热点地区。【原文：China is regaining its status as a hotspot for Southeast Asian tourists lured by new visa-free entry programs and easier access to the mainland’s cashless payment systems, according to booking platform Klook Travel Technology Ltd.】

item.title: 印度资金流入将跟随中国的债券指数玩法而降温
item.description: 如果中国的经验可以作为借鉴，那么在印度债券被纳入一个重要的全球债务指数之前，购买印度债券的热潮必将暂停。【原文：The frenzy to buy Indian bonds ahead of their entry into a key global debt index is set to pause if China’s experience is any guide.】

item.title: 米莱的全面放松管制计划通过参议院第一道关卡
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统试图放松阿根廷经济管制的主要立法项目在反对党控制的上议院僵持数周之后，距离决定性投票又近了一步。【原文：President Javier Milei’s main legislative attempt to deregulate Argentina’s economy is one step closer to a decisive vote after weeks of stalemate in the opposition-controlled upper chamber.】

item.title: Logan 80 亿美元的重组取决于豪华大厦贷款
item.description: 中国开发商罗格朗集团公司（Logan Group Co.【原文：Chinese developer Logan Group Co. is entering a crucial stage in its $8 billion offshore restructuring, with just three months to pay or refinance a loan or risk losing control of a key luxury home project.】
